sources.title: The Troubles: A Dublin Story | Full True Story Movie | 2024 Crime Action Drama Movie
sources.description:
Based on a true story. Two young Dublin brothers must navigate loyalty, honour and the dangerous world of republicanism as they fuel the Northern war machine - by any means necessary.

2024.  Stars: Ray Malone, Adam Redmond, Wayne Byrne
